tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DeveloperAppInsightsApiKey.description: The Application Insights API Key to associate with the Bot Channels Registration.

DeveloperAppInsightsApplicationId.description: The Application Insights Application ID to associate with the Bot Channels Registration.

DeveloperAppInsightsKey.description: The Application Insights Key to associate with the Bot Channels Registration.

DisplayName.description: The name of the Bot Channels Registration will be displayed as. This defaults to `name` if not specified.

Location.description: The supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

MicrosoftAppId.description: The Microsoft Application ID for the Bot Channels Registration. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the Bot Channels Registration. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Must be globally unique.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Bot Channels Registration. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Sku.description: The SKU of the Bot Channels Registration. Valid values include `F0` or `S1`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
